participant_1.background:
I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
my dad was a cop until he was killed.
I'm a single guy living in a small apartment with my dog.
I like to spend rainy days organizing my office supplies.
I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.background:
I've been spending a lot of time drawing and painting since I quit my job.
I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands.
my favorite band is dream theater.
i listen to techno music , exclusively.
i own a dog that is small.

content.text: Hey, how are you today?
Doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
Pretty good! I'm just hanging out at home. What are you up to today?
I'm working on a new painting. I'm trying to get better at drawing animals.
That's awesome! What kind of animals do you like to draw?
I like to draw dogs and cats the most. They're the cutest!
I agree! I have a dog, she's a golden retriever.
Aww, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly and fluffy.
They are! She's the best dog ever. What kind of dog do you have?
I have a mini schnauzer. He's a little bit crazy, but he's also really cute.
Mini schnauzers are so cute! I love their little beards.
Yeah, they're pretty great! What's your favorite band?
My favorite band is Dream Theater. They're a progressive metal band.
I've heard of them! I've never listened to them, though. What kind of music do they make?
They're a pretty complex band, but they're really good. They have a lot of technical skill and they're really creative.
That sounds cool! I'll have to check them out sometime.
You should! I think you'd like them.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
No problem! I'm always happy to share my music with people.
You seem pretty cool. We should hang out sometime.
Yeah, that would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Perfect! I'll let you know what time I'm free.
Sounds good!
Talk to you later!
Bye!
